subject: Re: Order #SSN4988, how did it go?
description_text:
I love the pedals, they're amazing. I noticed on the main portion of the
email stating the item, it says with haptic reactors. However I never
received any, only the pedals showed up. I just would like to clarify if
they were on the order and receipt?

On Tue, Jan 6, 2026, 9:21 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Christopher, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only
> takes a few

conversations.body_text: Hi Christopher McGrath,     I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?

Yes! I received it the full order! Thank you for your time!

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026, 1:25 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Christopher McGrath,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
